[//]: # (category: Chart)
[//]: # (icon: fa-pie-chart)

#Simple
* import { Addon, ChartData, SimpleModule } from '@ericsson/oden';

The simple component doesn't display a chart on the left hand side. This component should be used for displaying addons only. 
```
<cui-simple
    [color]="'#029FC4'"
    [dataSet]="Array<ChartData>"
    [addons]="Array<Addon>">
</cui-simple>
```

###[color]_:string___*__
The base color used by addons, ie `'#029FC4'`. IE the bullets in the legend addon.

###[dataSet]_:Array&lt;ChartData&gt;___*__
An array of chart data that should be listed/summarized in addons.

###[addons]_:Array&lt;Addon&gt;___*__
An array of addons that should be listed within the component.
